alert.note: Alert for Lares; Las Marias; Moca; Rincon; San Sebastian; Utuado (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 10 at 2:12PM ADT until July 10 at 4:30PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following , Adjuntas, Aguada, Anasco, Lares, Las Marias, Moca, Rincon, San Sebastian and Utuado. * WHEN...Until 415 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Rises in small streams and normally dry arroyos. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 110 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to showers and thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Soils are already saturated in Aguada and Anasco, mudslides are possible as well. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Lares; Las Marias; Moca; Rincon; San Sebastian; Utuado
